content: Talking to the Shen Monkey in his cave, you’ll find that he’s a merchant of gourds, drinks, and brews! Be sure to check all of his options out:

The content is as follows:
Talking to the Shen Monkey in his cave, you’ll find that he’s a merchant of gourds, drinks, and brews! Be sure to check all of his options out:
